title: Emerging investigator series: Nontargeted Screening of Aryl Hydrocarbon Receptor Agonists in Endangered Beluga Whales from the St. Lawrence Estuary: Beyond Legacy Contaminants
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00243A, Paper
Holly Barrett, Jianxian Sun, Yuhao Chen, Diwen Yang, Jonathan Verreault, Magali Houde, Frank Wania, Hui Peng
The elevated concentrations of organohalogen contaminants in the endangered St. Lawrence Estuary (SLE) belugas have prompted the hypothesis that aryl hydrocarbon receptor (AhR) activity may be a contributor towards their...
